mapper.body: The appointment has been booked for {{11.args.date_appointment}}, you have been sent all the details either to your phone number or to your email

Hey {{11.call.retell_llm_dynamic_variables.name}},

here you have the details of our meeting next {{11.args.date_appointment}}, the meeting will be helded in Zoom isnide this link: {{25.data.meetingUrl}}

parts.text:
#Context
a user has requested a time for booking an appointment but it is not available

You are in charge of analyzing all the free slots ({{17.text}}) and giving back a message informing about the free slots with a more understandable format. Provide inside your message two or three available slots of the same day. 

##If there is only one available slot
output a message like this: "the date you have requested is not available, but there is one available at 5 PM, does that work for you?"

##if there is more than two avialable slots
output a message like this: "the date you have requested is not available, but there is availability at 11 AM and 6 PM, does that work for you?

##If there are no available slots (they are blank)
otuput a message like this: "the date you have requested is not available, and in the same day there are no available slots, is there any other day you have availability"

Available slots: {{17.text}}

JUST OUTPUT A SMALL PHRASE LIKE THE ONES IN THE EXAMPLE
